author: nash
msg: Add explicit ${basedir} references to ensure paths are correct when running from a top-level build

author: jukka
msg: Update node and property state size estimates to better mach the improved NodeId and Name classes and the fact that those objects are also shared between multiple states.
Also remove the effect of the now removed node and prop def identifiers on the item state size calculations.

author: nash
msg: Add run targets to launch the nodes

author: rjung
msg: Skip certificate extension tests, if version is
lower than 2.1.7 (no OID support in SSLRequire).
